name: Fengyun-4C
location_str: LC-2 (LC-2) @ Xichang Satellite Launch Center, CHN
description: China's geostationary meteorological satellite program FY-4 (Feng Yun 4) is the second generation of chinese geostationary meteorological satellites.
rocket_fact: Long March 3B's third stage uses cryogenic liquid hydrogen and liquid oxygen engines.
